description:
An elevated take on a classic, our Cardiff SS Pocket T-Shirt is sure to become a staple in your wardrobe. Enjoy that well-loved, pre-broken-in feeling from wear number one. Made from bestselling Cardiff fabric—with naturally odor resistant hemp—this style makes everyday outfitting easy.

This basic men's tee also adds an extra element of comfort and style to your look thanks to the stretchy ribbed collar and chest pocket. And because of the hard working hemp fibers we mentioned above, it's a perfect piece for relaxed and active moments as well.
name: Prana Cardiff SS Pocket T-Shirt - Slim - Mens
